successes.title: FOVE: The World's First Eye Tracking Virtual Reality Headset
successes.description: Human connection in a virtual world: FOVE reads subtle eye movements for more precise control in VR. Missed the FOVE campaign? Head over to GetFOVE.com to get yours! Thanks to all of our Kickstarter backers for making our vision happen!

Pledges.description: JOIN THE COMMUNITY: Help us on our journey to take gaming to the next level!
Even if you aren’t pledging for a FOVE, you can still be part of this community, get project updates, and make the Hall of Fame on our website. This pledge level has no physical reward.
FOVE CLASSY PIN BADGE: A limited edition pin-badge from FOVE, only available via Kickstarter.
You'll also receive a sincere thank you from the FOVE team and make the Hall of Fame on our website.
FOVE VIP T-SHIRT: A limited edition t-shirt from FOVE, only available via Kickstarter.
It's soft and you'll love to wear it everywhere. We'll collect your size after the campaign. You'll also receive a sincere thank you from the FOVE team and make the Hall of Fame on our website.
FOVE EARLIEST BIRD: Get the best deal on FOVE by being among the first earlybird backers!

FOVE VR Headset + development kit is intended for game studios, indies and enthusiastic tinkerers.
This includes access to our SDK, Docs, Samples, Engine plugins and Developer Forums. Choose White or Black after the campaign.

FOVE EARLIEST BIRD: Thanks to our first 200 Backers! This reward is only open to those adjusting from the same $349 Pledge. 
Please adjust for free shipping to US and Japan, with $30 International shipping.

FOVE VR Headset + development kit
Choose White or Black after the campaign
FOVE EARLY BIRD: Get a great deal on FOVE by being an early backer!

FOVE VR Headset + development kit is intended for game studios, indies and enthusiastic tinkerers.
This includes access to our SDK, Docs, Samples, Engine plugins and Developer Forums. Choose White or Black after the campaign.
FOVE EARLY BIRD: Get a great deal on a limited number of FOVE headsets backing us early! (Free shipping to the US and Japan)

FOVE VR Headset + development kit is intended for game studios, indies and enthusiastic tinkerers. 
This includes access to our SDK, Docs, Samples, Engine plugins and Developer Forums. Choose White or Black after the campaign.
支援額375ドル以上
FOVE先行価格で入手: 初期からの支援者となってくださったことに感謝して、FOVEヘッドセットを数量限定での特別内容でご提供します。（米国と日本は無料発送）
FOVE VR ヘッドセット＋開発キットは、ゲームスタジオ、インディーズデベロッパー、熱心な機械マニアの方へ向けたセットです。内容はソフトウェア開発キット、ドキュメント、サンプル、エンジンプラグイン、デベロッパーフォーラムとなっています。キャンペーン後にホワイトまたはブラックをお選びください。
提供予定: 2016年5月
FOVE VR HEADSET: Please adjust your pledge to the new $399 Reward so we can close out duplicate rewards.

FOVE VR Headset + development kit is intended for game studios, indies and enthusiastic tinkerers. 
This includes access to our SDK, Docs, Samples, Engine plugins and Developer Forums. Choose White or Black after the campaign.
FOVE VR HEADSET: Show your support for Eye tracking in VR and get a FOVE + developer kit. (updated shipping)
